markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Advanced Thoughtform](/Feats.aspx?ID=3739) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 48</row>

**Archetype** [Psychic](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=185)

**Prerequisites**
[Basic Thoughtform](/Feats.aspx?ID=3737)

</column>

---

You gain one [psychic feat](/Classes.aspx?ID=21/feats). For the purpose of meeting its prerequisites, your psychic level is equal to half your character level.

**Special** You can select this feat more than once. Each time you select it, you gain another psychic feat.
name: Advanced Thoughtform
